name: claude-hub
description: Claude Hub - A curated collection of high-quality Claude Code plugins for software development workflows

plugins.name: rails-workflow
plugins.description: Complete workflow automation for Ruby on Rails development with model generation, controllers, Turbo Streams, service objects, RSpec setup, and API endpoints

plugins.name: react-typescript-workflow
plugins.description: Modern React and TypeScript development workflows with component generation, hooks, context, testing setup, form handling, and data fetching

plugins.name: rails-code-review-agent
plugins.description: Specialized agent for reviewing Rails code with expertise in conventions, security, performance, and best practices enforcement

plugins.name: react-typescript-code-review-agent
plugins.description: Expert code review agent for React and TypeScript with focus on modern patterns, type safety, performance, and accessibility

plugins.name: ui-ux-design-agent
plugins.description: Iterative UI/UX design and refinement specialist for creating accessible, responsive, and beautiful user interfaces

plugins.name: rails-dev-workflow
plugins.description: Comprehensive Rails development workflow with specialized AI agents for models, controllers, views, services, tests, and devops. Inspired by claude-on-rails but using native Claude Code capabilities.

plugins.name: rails-mcp-servers
plugins.description: MCP server configurations for Rails development providing access to Rails documentation, filesystem navigation, and Rails-specific tooling
